name: VNDetectTrajectoriesRequest
desc: A request that detects the trajectories of shapes moving along a parabolic path.

items.name: init(frameAnalysisSpacing: CMTime, trajectoryLength: Int, completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request to detect trajectories.

items.name: var targetFrameTime: CMTime
items.desc: The requested target frame time for processing trajectory detection.

items.name: var trajectoryLength: Int
items.desc: The number of points to detect before calculating a trajectory.

items.name: var objectMinimumNormalizedRadius: Float
items.desc: The minimum radius of the bounding circle of the object to track.

items.name: var objectMaximumNormalizedRadius: Float
items.desc: The maximum radius of the bounding circle of the object to track.

items.name: var results: [VNTrajectoryObservation]?
items.desc: The array of detected trajectory observations.

items.name: class VNTrajectoryObservation
items.desc: An observation that describes a detected trajectory.
